summary: Implemented a new JobRequirementsSection on the homepage with an anchored <section id="job-requirements"> and professional copy, and updated Navbar and Footer to include smooth-scroll navigation to that section (including from the Admin page by navigating back to Home first). One acceptance-criteria detail appears not met: the footer quick link does not actually navigate to the #job-requirements hash; it performs scrollIntoView via a button.

missing_requirements.requirement: Footer “Quick Links” includes a matching link that navigates to #job-requirements.
missing_requirements.reason: Footer uses a <button> with scrollIntoView('job-requirements') rather than a link (e.g., <a href="#job-requirements">) that navigates to the URL hash #job-requirements as stated in the AC.
